title: IAA Tonight | San Francisco 49ers Head Coach Kyle Shanahan
description: Brandon and Pacman are currently still on the training camp tour and had the chance to stop by 49ers camp and talk to head coach Kyle Shanahan. Find out the real reason why the 49ers drafted Trey Lance and what the future holds for Jimmy G. Plus, Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly and Brandon Flowers preview the Commanders upcoming season. Is this Carson Wentz's final shot at being a starter in the NFL?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Adam Pacman Jones, Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly, Brandon Flowers)
